column4: one thing I've been wondering about when it comes to gtkpod... Will I still be able to use the ipod with iTunes on a different computer? Will anything I copy to the iPod on my Ubuntu setup be removed when I connect to the iTunes computer, or will iTunes update itself?
If you know what I mean...
it should work the same way as itunes does, if you do get trouble you can just repair it again with the ipod firmware util (tough that would remove all the music on the ipod)
so it shouldnt be a problem, unless you do something realy wrong ;)
